name: Cult of Cthulhu
description:
Play as the High Priest of the Cult of Cthulhu in this strategy manager game. Your objective is to infiltrate the entire world with your cultists, slowly progressing toward world domination and inevitable apocalypse at the hands of Cthulhu!

Controls: 

  • Use the mouse to interact with the game. You can click on each game element(cultists and map regions) to check information about it.
  • To pass the turn, you may click on the "Pass Turn" button or press "Return" on your keyboard.

Tips: To send a cultist to a map region, click on the cultist, then click on the "Send to Region" button, then click on the desired region.
